verbs.description: “ Good luck to Alice Johnson . [V: Have] [ARG1: a wonderful life] ! ” President Trump tweeted Thursday morning , one day after commuting the sentence of the woman who served 21 years in an Alabama prison for her part in a non - violent drug conspiracy .
